TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlIgnoreAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 表示 的 方法不要序列化公用欄位或公用讀取/寫入屬性值。

span.span: Instructs the method of the not to serialize the public field or public read/write property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬於一系列屬性可控制如何序列化或還原序列化物件。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 如果您套用之類別的任何成員會忽略的成員，當序列化或還原序列化類別的執行個體。If you apply the to any member of a class, the ignores the member when serializing or deserializing an instance of the class. 如需類似屬性的完整清單，請參閱[屬性，控制 XML 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 您可以覆寫所造成的行為藉由建立物件，並設定其屬性`false`。You can override the behavior caused by the by creating an object, and setting its property to `false`. 您必須物件的執行個體類別。You must the object to an instance of the class. 最後，您必須使用物件建構的執行個體類別才能呼叫或方法。Lastly, you must use the object to construct an instance of the class before you call the or methods. [XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)偶爾會產生時建立的類別，從結構描述檔案 (.xsd)。The [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) occasionally generates the when creating classes from a schema file (.xsd). 這是因為實值類型不能設定為`null`，但可以是所有的 XML 資料類型。This behavior occurs because value types cannot be set to `null`, but all XML data types can be. 因此，此工具會建立兩個欄位時遇到 XML 類型對應至值型別： 其中一個來保存值和其他形式的特殊欄位`fieldnameSpecified`，其中`fieldname`會以欄位或屬性的名稱取代。Therefore, the tool creates two fields when it encounters an XML type that maps to a value type: one to hold the value and another special field that takes the form of `fieldnameSpecified`, where the `fieldname` is replaced by the name of the field or property. 但是請注意，這個特殊欄位，會產生結構描述指定的項目具有沒有最小項目時，才 (minOccurs ="0") 和項目具有沒有預設值。Notice, however, that this special field is generated only when the schema specifies that the element has no minimum occurrence (minOccurs = "0") and that the element has no default value. 設定，並檢查此特殊欄位，以判斷是否已設定值，欄位或屬性。The sets and checks this special field to determine whether a value has been set for the field or property. 必須序列化的特殊欄位，因為工具會將套用給它。Because the special field must not be serialized, the tool applies the to it. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用 word`XmlIgnore`取代較長程式碼中。You can use the word `XmlIgnore` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下列範例會示範名為類別`Group`，其中包含名為的欄位`Comment`。The following example shows a class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Comment`. 此範例將指派到欄位，藉此指示要略過的欄位，當序列化或還原序列化類別的執行個體。The example assigns the to the field, thereby instructing the to ignore the field when serializing or deserializing an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlIgnoreAttribute.XmlIgnoreAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範名為類別`Group`，其中包含名為的欄位`Comment`。The following example shows a class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Comment`. 此範例將指派到欄位，藉此指示要略過的欄位，當序列化或還原序列化類別的執行個體。The example assigns the to the field, thereby instructing the to ignore the field when serializing or deserializing an instance of the class.
